item.title: Sick Tips to Read While Sick in Bed (Devlog #3)
item.description: I’ve been out sick but compiled a stash of UE4 tips and tricks from my week-long Twitter scrolling for you all to enjoy.

item.title: Sinister Santa and the road ahead (Devlog #2)
item.description: Graduating college, making a holiday horror game, and plans for the future

item.title: Blood for the Blueprint Gods! (Devlog #1)
item.description: I’m officially one week into development on a so-far-unnamed horror-inspired arena shooter and I’m having a ton of fun with it.

item.title: The Exhausted Optimist's Guide to Restarting (Devlog #0)
item.description: It’s a cruel and unusual feeling, wanting to dive back into the work you love but being entirely burnt out on it.

item.title: Buckshot
item.description: A rogue prince seeks revenge on his former friends with only the power of his own wits and a demon-possessed shotgun.

item.title: Godslayer
item.description: The Sumerian First-Person Slaughterfest inspired by the tradition of retro shooters matched with modern design and aesthetics.

item.title: Resume
item.description: .btn { background-color: DodgerBlue; border-width: thin; color: white; padding: 12px 30px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 20px; } .btn:hover { background-color: white; color: DodgerBlue; border-width: thin; } This browser does not support PDF! Download Resume

item.title: About
item.description: The nerd dude that made this whole mess, yours truly Bio Video games have been a significant part of my life since I was old enough to use a computer. My passion for the medium has only grown since then and Iâ€™ve come to appreciate that games are an unparalleled means of connecting people and sharing experiences. I want to be a part of creating the sort of virtual worlds and systems that allow players to make lifelong friends and memories.
